---
category: news
title: "Ride Hailing Startup Uses Shufti Pro Biometric Onboarding for KYC Compliance"
excerpt: "Ride-hailing startup Vengo has become the latest customer to embrace Shufti Pro‘s remote onboarding solution. The company will use the Shufti Pro solution to verify the identities of its drivers. Shufti Pro’s solution is designed to use facial recognition to match end users’ selfie images to those of their official identity documents."
